document_data.caption: A map of Luiren showing Hambone Bay on the western end of Luirenstrand.
document_data.name: Hambone Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Hambone Bay''' was a small body of water located on the western end of [[Luirenstrand]] in [[Luiren]].
document_data.Geography: Hambone Bay abutted the central coastline of Luiren. It was bordered on the south by the [[Krenalir Peninsula]] and the [[Mortick Swamp]], on the west by the coastal cities of [[Chethel]] and [[Beluir]], and to the north by a portion of Luiren's central northern coastline.
